snippet: Chelation therapy proved beneficial to people with heart disease, reducing the rate of death and cardiovascular problems in a clinical trial, researchers said on Sunday.
abstract: Study sponsored by National Institutes of Health says chelation therapy proved beneficial to people with heart disease, reducing rate of death and cardiovascular problems in clinical trial.
lead_paragraph: Chelation therapy proved beneficial to people with heart disease, reducing the rate of death and cardiovascular problems in a clinical trial, researchers said on Sunday.

headline.seo: Chelation Therapy Shows Slight Benefit in Heart Disease Clinical Trial
headline.main: Much-Debated Treatment for Heart Disease Shows Slight Benefit in Clinical Trial
headline.print_headline: Much-Debated Treatment for Heart Disease Shows Slight Benefit in Clinical Trial
